verses.verse: <S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> the <S%G285>sand<s%> of the <S%G2281>sea<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> a <S%G2342>beast<s%> rise <S%G305>up<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%>, <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2776>heads<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G2768>horns<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2768>horns<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G1238>crowns<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2776>heads<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G988>blasphemy<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G2342>beast<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> like <S%G3664>a<s%> <S%G3917>leopard<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4228>feet<s%> were <S%G5613>as<s%> the feet of a <S%G715>bear<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of a <S%G3023>lion<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1404>dragon<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2362>throne<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3391>one<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2776>heads<s%> as it <S%G5613>were<s%> <S%G4969>wounded<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2288>deadly<s%> <S%G4127>wound<s%> was <S%G2323>healed<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> the <S%G1093>world<s%> <S%G2296>wondered<s%> <S%G3694%G99999>after<s%> the <S%G2342>beast<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G4352>worshiped<s%> the <S%G1404>dragon<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> to the <S%G2342>beast<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G4352>worshiped<s%> the <S%G2342>beast<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G5101>Who<s%> is like <S%G3664>to<s%> the <S%G2342>beast<s%>? <S%G5101>Who<s%> is <S%G1410>able<s%> to make <S%G4170>war<s%> <S%G3326>against<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>?

<S%G2532>And<s%> there was <S%G1325>given<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> a <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G2980>speaking<s%> great <S%G3173>things<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G988>blasphemies<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> was <S%G1325>given<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> to <S%G4160>continue<s%> <S%G5062>forty<s%> and <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3376>months<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G2730>live<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> shall <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G3686>names<s%> <S%G1125>are<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G976>book<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%> of the <S%G721>Lamb<s%> <S%G4969>slain<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G2602>foundation<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%>.

He <S%G1536>that<s%> <S%G4863>leads<s%> into <S%G161>captivity<s%> shall <S%G5217>go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G161>captivity<s%>: he <S%G1536>that<s%> <S%G615>kills<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> the <S%G3162>sword<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> be <S%G615>killed<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> the <S%G3162>sword<s%>. <S%G5602>Here<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G5281>patience<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%> of the <S%G40>saints<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G2342>animal<s%> coming <S%G305>up<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2768>horns<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> a <S%G721>lamb<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G2980>spoke<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G1404>dragon<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G4160>exercises<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1849>power<s%> of the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2342>beast<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4160>causes<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> them which <S%G2730%G99999>live<s%> in <S%G846>it<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G4352>worship<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2342>beast<s%>, <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G2288%G99999>deadly<s%> <S%G4127>wound<s%> was <S%G2323>healed<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G4160>does<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4592>wonders<s%>, <S%G2443>so<s%> <S%G2532>that<s%> he <S%G4160>makes<s%> <S%G4442>fire<s%> come <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%>,

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G4105>deceives<s%> them that <S%G2730>live<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the means of those <S%G4592>miracles<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> had <S%G1325>power<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of the <S%G2342>beast<s%>; <S%G3004>saying<s%> to them that <S%G2730>live<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%>, that they should <S%G4160>make<s%> an <S%G1504>image<s%> to the <S%G2342>beast<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> the <S%G4127>wound<s%> by a <S%G3162>sword<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> did <S%G2198>live<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> had <S%G1325>power<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G4151>life<s%> to the <S%G1504>image<s%> of the <S%G2342>beast<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> the <S%G1504>image<s%> of the <S%G2342>beast<s%> <S%G2980>should<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4160>cause<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> as <S%G3745>many<s%> <S%G302>as<s%> <S%G4352>would<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G4352>worship<s%> the <S%G1504>image<s%> of the <S%G2342>beast<s%> should be <S%G615>killed<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> that <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G1410>might<s%> <S%G59>buy<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4453>sell<s%>, except <S%G1508>he<s%> that <S%G2192>has<s%> the <S%G5480>mark<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2342>beast<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> the <S%G706>number<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%>.

<S%G5602>Here<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom<s%>.
